CEEvent.Name: CE_common_femdom_male
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale1}Your captor invites you to her tent and you follow, cautiously. You find her sitting on her bed, her dress hiked up over her legs, rubbing her pussy with one hand and holding a bottle of wine in her other. You start to realize why you are here and turn to leave, but it seems the guards have moved into place behind you; though they're facing the other direction, you get the distinct impression they will not look favorably upon any attempts to escape.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale2}Kneel down and crawl over to her.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_femdom_male_continued
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale4}Your captor smiles as you approach, spreading her legs invitingly, but as you get closer she grabs you painfully by the hair and pours half the bottle of wine down your throat. As you gasp for air, she orders you to swallow and the burning liquid fills your stomach. As your head begins to spin, she guides your mouth to her cleft and orders you to pleasure her.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_femdom_male_continued_2
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale6}You do your best to satisfy her with your tongue, and are rewarded with a crushing sensation around your neck as she uses her legs to pull your face tighter into her cunt. You struggle to breathe as she rubs your lips against her clit, arching and bucking against you. When she finally comes, your mouth is flooded with her sweet-tasting fluid. She tells you she'll have you again soon. The guards outside chuckle lightly as you leave, your face still drenched in her wetness.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_athletics_training
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale7}Your captors force you into hard labor, hauling heavy stones and supplies across the camp. The work is exhausting but you can feel your muscles strengthening with each passing day.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale9}Conserve your energy and do the minimum.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_smithing_work
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale10}Your captors put you to work in their makeshift forge, repairing weapons and armor. The blacksmith overseer is a harsh taskmaster but skilled in his craft. You could learn from him if you pay attention.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale12}Do your best to learn despite inexperience.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_medical_aid
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale14}A plague has swept through the camp and many are sick. Your captors demand you help tend to the ill, despite your own weakened state. The camp healer shows you which herbs to use and how to dress wounds properly.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale15}Use your medical knowledge to help effectively.
{=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale16}Do your best to learn and help.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_tactical_observation
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale18}Your captor forces you to observe their training drills and war councils, perhaps to humiliate you or perhaps to test your mettle. You watch as they discuss tactics and formations, making mental notes of their strategies and weaknesses.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_stealth_opportunity
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale22}Late at night, you notice the guards are lax in their watch. A skilled rogue might be able to slip away unnoticed, or at least steal some supplies to improve your situation. The shadows call to you.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_persuasion_attempt
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale26}One of your captors seems less hostile than the others. Perhaps with the right words, you could improve your situation or even negotiate better treatment. A charismatic leader might sway them to your cause.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale27}Use your natural charm to win them over.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_town_tavern_wench
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale30}Your captors have rented rooms at a local tavern while conducting business in town. A buxom serving wench notices you bound and guarded in the corner. She approaches your captors and negotiates something with them, coin changing hands. She returns with a knowing smile and leads you to a back room, saying your captors have "rented you out" for the evening to work off their tab.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_town_tavern_wench_service
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale33}The wench locks the door behind you and pushes you onto the bed. "Don't worry, handsome," she purrs, straddling you. "I paid good coin for you, and I intend to get my money's worth." She strips away her bodice, revealing ample breasts, and proceeds to use your body for her pleasure throughout the night. By morning, you're exhausted but she seems satisfied. She tosses you back to your captors with a wink, saying you were "worth every penny."

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_town_noble_lady
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale35}While your captors parade you through the town marketplace in chains, a wealthy noblewoman takes interest in you. She approaches your female captor and the two women speak privately, glancing at you and laughing. Money exchanges hands, and the noblewoman leads you to her manor, saying she's "purchased an evening's entertainment."

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_town_noble_lady_manor
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale37}In her luxurious bedchamber, the noblewoman circles you like a predator. "My husband is away on campaign," she says, unlacing her gown. "And I have certain... needs." She's surprisingly gentle at first, but her passion quickly becomes demanding. She rides you vigorously, taking her pleasure multiple times through the night. In the morning, she dresses you, kisses you deeply, and returns you to your captors well-rested and well-fed, with a satisfied smile on her face.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_town_market_labor
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale39}Your captors force you to haul goods at the town marketplace, carrying heavy crates and barrels between merchants' stalls. The work is backbreaking under the hot sun, but the exercise strengthens your body. Local traders eye you with a mixture of pity and curiosity.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_castle_interrogation
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale42}You're dragged from the castle dungeons to an interrogation chamber. Your female captor circles you slowly, candlelight casting shadows across her face. "Tell me about your allies, their movements, their plans," she demands. When you remain silent, she steps closer, her breath hot on your neck. "Perhaps I can persuade you another way..."

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_castle_interrogation_seduction
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale45}She begins by running her hands over your chest, then lower. "You're a handsome prisoner," she whispers. "Cooperate, and I'll make this pleasurable for both of us." Her touch is skilled and deliberate, breaking down your resistance. Eventually she straddles you, riding you slowly while continuing her questions. In your weakened state, you reveal minor details between gasps. Satisfied, she finishes with you and leaves you chained but strangely content.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_castle_repairs
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale47}The castle is under repair from previous siege damage. You're put to work hauling stone blocks and mixing mortar alongside other prisoners. The castle engineer, a gruff veteran, barks orders but occasionally offers advice on proper construction techniques if you show interest.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_village_healer
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale50}Your captors stop at a village to tend their wounds after a skirmish. The village healer, a wise woman with knowing eyes, examines you as well. "This one is injured too," she tells your captors. They reluctantly agree to let her treat you. In her cottage, she tends your wounds with skilled hands and herbal remedies.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_village_farming
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale53}Your captors stop at a village they control and "rent you out" to work the fields. A farmer's daughter is assigned to supervise your work. She's young, pretty, and seems amused by your predicament. As the day grows hot, she frequently offers you water and stolen glances.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_village_farming_barn
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale56}As evening approaches, the farmer's daughter leads you to the barn to "put away tools." Once inside, she pushes you against a hay bale and kisses you boldly. "I've never been with a prisoner before," she giggles nervously. "Father won't be back for hours..." She strips eagerly and pulls you down into the hay. The encounter is quick but passionate, her inexperience offset by enthusiasm. Afterward, she straightens her dress and warns you to keep this secret.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_camp_washing
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale58}After days of travel, your captors make camp near a stream. Your female captor orders you to help her wash clothes and equipment. As you work beside the water, she strips down to bathe, seemingly unconcerned by your presence. She catches you staring and smirks. "See something you like, prisoner?"

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_camp_washing_intimate
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale61}She laughs at your honesty and beckons you closer. "Come wash my back, then." You obey, your hands trembling as you touch her wet skin. She leans back against you, clearly enjoying your nervousness. "You know," she murmurs, "prisoners who please me get better treatment." She turns and kisses you hungrily, pulling you into the shallow water. What follows is frantic and passionate, the risk of being caught adding excitement. Afterward, she warns you this changes nothing about your status as her prisoner.

CEEvent.Name: CE_common_captive_male_roadside_rest
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptiveEventsMale63}During a rest stop on a long march, you're made to sit apart from the main group. You observe your surroundings and the behavior of your captors, noting their routines and weaknesses. A keen observer might spot opportunities for escape or ways to improve their standing.
